content: *celebrate the presidential election with this john mccain finger puppet -- great way to teach your children about politics lion brand yarn * lion brand pattern # 80657ad skill level easy microspun article #910 3 colors 1 ball each *shown in french vanilla ebony lily white* crochet hook - size g-6 4 mm split ring stitch markers small amounts of red and pink yarn some construction required to finish see also 80658ad barack obama finger puppet 1 1 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/barack-obama-finger-puppet
